descriptions: Responding to leads on New and Used Car Sales, remotely all over Canada, by phone, email or texting
Selling the client on coming in store, by booking test drives, or info sessions with Sales Managers
Communicating with Car Dealerships to relay information to customers such as pricing, carfax, and vehicle availability
Using various CRM programs to log customer interaction, such as if they have been contacted, and various customer requests
Selling Telus mobility and home services, explaining costs of phone/plan
Providing customer service, explaining terms and showing basic functions of smartphones
Transfering phone data and basic tech support such as helping customers login to accounts or help reset passwords
Shipping and receiving inventory such as smartphones and accessories
Fully remote with other developers on opposite time zones
Use vue.js front end technologies including SCSS in Visual Studio Code
Backend technologies including JavaScript, TypeScript, Laravel, Navicat
Completing tasks using Jira to manage, slack to communicate, and git for version control
Converting old database tables to new tables with PHP scripts and creating front end to pick which tables to convert
Designing fake data to insert into databases for testing
Created a mobile app with login and authentication with firebase with Flutter and Dart
Using close attention to detail to set labels to set as ground truth for machine learning segmentation
Make suggestions for features on the software we are using, and implementing in C#
Using Microsoft teams to collaborate with other Co-op students and manage time and other projects
Created a neural net model using Tensorflow python scripts

jobs.company: Hoja Express Aberdeen Mall Mongolian Grill
descriptions: Cooking Mongolian grill style stir-fry on a cast iron grill
Communicating with customers to serve them in an environment with tips
Working with POS system and cashing out and dividing tips evenly with coworkers
Working under immediate deadlines in fast food style pace
Following food safe procedures and safety, understanding Kitchen culture
